attributes.additional_details: Tell give us a day to rest at least and have a break from schoolwork
attributes.background: We go to school for 5 days get cram loaded with work and homework then have 2 days off with more homework and no one gets any rest

rejection.details:
We think that the below petition is very similar to the issue you have raised. 

Require schools to make Friday a part of the school weekend
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597715
